metadata.title: CVE-2015-9275 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
ARC 5.21q allows directory traversal via a full pathname in an archivefile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

arc - 5.21q-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: arc package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.21q-6').
